TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ObfuscateAssemblyAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class ObfuscateAssemblyAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ObfuscateAssemblyAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指示模糊处理工具对适当的程序集类型使用其标准模糊处理规则。

span.span: Instructs obfuscation tools to use their standard obfuscation rules for the appropriate assembly type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和特性，可以为程序集作者为其二进制文件添加批注，以便模糊处理工具可以用最小的外部配置正确处理它们。The and attributes provide a way for assembly authors to annotate their binaries so that obfuscation tools can process them correctly with minimal external configuration. 将此特性应用于程序集指示模糊处理工具对程序集类型使用其默认规则。Applying this attribute to an assembly tells the obfuscation tool to use its default rules for the assembly type. > [!IMPORTANT] > 将此特性应用不会自动模糊处理程序集。Applying this attribute does not automatically obfuscate the assembly. 应用此属性是创建模糊处理工具的配置文件的替代方法。Applying the attribute is an alternative to creating a configuration file for the obfuscation tool. 也就是说，它只提供有关模糊处理工具的说明。That is, it merely provides instructions for an obfuscation tool. Microsoft 建议的模糊处理工具供应商遵循此处所述的语义。Microsoft recommends that vendors of obfuscation tools follow the semantics described here. 但是，则无法保证特定工具，Microsoft 建议如下所示。However, there is no guarantee that a particular tool follows Microsoft recommendations. 您可以将应用中程序集的类型和这些类型的成员。You can apply to types within an assembly, and to members on those types. 最里面的属性控制模糊处理工具的方式处理任何特定的代码实体。The innermost attribute controls the way an obfuscation tool treats any particular code entity. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了已标记有一个私有程序集。The following code example shows a private assembly that has been marked with the . 属性是`false`，以防止模糊处理工具在处理后去除该特性。The property is `false`, to prevent the obfuscation tool from stripping the attribute after processing. 有关演示如何使用的代码示例与，请参阅类。For a code example that shows the use of with , see the class. [!code-csharp[ObfuscateAssemblyAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ObfuscateAssemblyAttribute/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ObfuscateAssemblyAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ObfuscateAssemblyAttribute/vb/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(bool assemblyIsPrivate) cil managed

param.name: assemblyIsPrivate
param.span: 如果程序集在某个应用程序范围内使用，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the assembly is used within the scope of one application; otherwise, .

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，指定要模糊处理的程序集是公共的还是私有的。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying whether the assembly to be obfuscated is public or private.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果它们仅由您的应用程序，并且不使用的其他软件的库，将标记为私有程序集。Mark assemblies as private if they are used only by your application, and are not libraries to be used by other software. 通常情况下，将作为专用程序集标记指示模糊处理程序，它可以将它模糊处理的所有方法，包括公共方法，作为对应用程序进行模糊处理的一部分的名称。Generally, marking an assembly as private tells an obfuscator that it can obfuscate the names of all methods, including public methods, as part of obfuscating an application. 如果程序集是公共的模糊处理程序不应进行模糊处理公共成员的名称。If an assembly is public, an obfuscator should not obfuscate the names of public members. > [!IMPORTANT] > 将此特性应用不会自动模糊处理程序集。Applying this attribute does not automatically obfuscate the assembly. 应用此属性是创建模糊处理工具的配置文件的替代方法。Applying the attribute is an alternative to creating a configuration file for the obfuscation tool. 也就是说，它只提供有关模糊处理工具的说明。That is, it merely provides instructions for an obfuscation tool. Microsoft 建议的模糊处理工具供应商遵循此处所述的语义。Microsoft recommends that vendors of obfuscation tools follow the semantics described here. 但是，则无法保证特定工具，Microsoft 建议如下所示。However, there is no guarantee that a particular tool follows Microsoft recommendations. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何特性构造函数指定程序集为私有。The following code example shows how the attribute constructor specifies that an assembly is private. 属性是`false`，以防止模糊处理工具在处理后去除该特性。The property is `false`, to prevent the obfuscation tool from stripping the attribute after processing. [!code-csharp[ObfuscateAssemblyAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ObfuscateAssemblyAttribute/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ObfuscateAssemblyAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ObfuscateAssemblyAttribute/vb/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AssemblyIsPrivate As Boolean
public: property bool AssemblyIsPrivate { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个 值，该值指示程序集是否标记为私有。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the assembly was marked private.

value.span: 如果程序集标记为私有，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the assembly was marked private; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 私有程序集使用仅由应用程序的这是一部分，而不是由其他软件。A private assembly is used only by the application of which it is a part, and not by other software. > [!IMPORTANT] > 将此特性应用不会自动模糊处理程序集。Applying this attribute does not automatically obfuscate the assembly. 应用此属性是创建模糊处理工具的配置文件的替代方法。Applying the attribute is an alternative to creating a configuration file for the obfuscation tool. 也就是说，它只提供有关模糊处理工具的说明。That is, it merely provides instructions for an obfuscation tool. Microsoft 建议的模糊处理工具供应商遵循此处所述的语义。Microsoft recommends that vendors of obfuscation tools follow the semantics described here. 但是，则无法保证特定工具，Microsoft 建议如下所示。However, there is no guarantee that a particular tool follows Microsoft recommendations. ## Examples 以下代码示例演示如何设置该属性构造函数属性设置为`true`，以指定程序集是专用。The following code example shows how the attribute constructor sets the property to `true`, to specify that an assembly is private. 属性是`false`，以防止模糊处理工具在处理后去除该特性。The property is `false`, to prevent the obfuscation tool from stripping the attribute after processing. [!code-csharp[ObfuscateAssemblyAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ObfuscateAssemblyAttribute/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ObfuscateAssemblyAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ObfuscateAssemblyAttribute/vb/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool StripAfterObfuscation { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个 值，该值指示模糊处理工具是否应在处理后移除该特性。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the obfuscation tool should remove the attribute after processing.

value.span: 如果模糊处理工具应在处理后移除该特性，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the obfuscation tool should remove the attribute after processing; otherwise, .
The default value for this property is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您的库将包含的另一个应用程序，并作为该应用程序的一部分进行模糊处理，则不应去除的属性。Attributes should not be stripped if your library will be included as part of another application, and obfuscated as part of that application. 指定模糊处理工具应去除不会影响的实例，已应用于类型和程序集内的成员。Specifying that obfuscation tools should strip the does not affect instances of that have been applied to types and members within the assembly. > [!IMPORTANT] > 将此特性应用不会自动模糊处理程序集。Applying this attribute does not automatically obfuscate the assembly. 应用此属性是创建模糊处理工具的配置文件的替代方法。Applying the attribute is an alternative to creating a configuration file for the obfuscation tool. 也就是说，它只提供有关模糊处理工具的说明。That is, it merely provides instructions for an obfuscation tool. Microsoft 建议的模糊处理工具供应商遵循此处所述的语义。Microsoft recommends that vendors of obfuscation tools follow the semantics described here. 但是，则无法保证特定工具，Microsoft 建议如下所示。However, there is no guarantee that a particular tool follows Microsoft recommendations. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示属性与属性设置为`false`，以防止模糊处理工具在处理后去除该特性。The following code example shows the attribute with the property set to `false`, to prevent the obfuscation tool from stripping the attribute after processing.
